verses.verse: I said, <WH559> "I will watch <WH8104> my ways, <WH1870> so that I don't <WH2398> sin with my tongue. <WH3956> I will keep <WH8104> my mouth <WH6310> with a bridle <WH4269> while the wicked is before me. <WH7563>"
I was mute <WH481> with silence. <WH1747> I held my peace, <WH2814> even from good. <WH2896> My sorrow <WH3511> was stirred. <WH5916>
My heart <WH3820> was hot <WH2552> within <WH7130> me. <WH1901> While I meditated, the fire <WH784> burned: <WH1197> <WH227> I spoke <WH1696> with my tongue: <WH3956>
"Yahweh, <WH3068> show <WH3045> me my end, <WH7093> what is the measure <WH4060> of my days. <WH3117> Let me know <WH3045> how frail I am. <WH2310>

Behold, <WH5414> you have made my days <WH3117> handbreadths. <WH2947> My lifetime <WH2465> is as nothing before you. <WH3605> Surely every man <WH120> stands <WH5324> as <WH3605> a breath. <WH1892>" Selah. <WH5542>
"Surely every man <WH376> walks <WH1980> like a shadow. <WH6754> Surely they busy <WH1993> themselves in vain. <WH1892> He heaps up, <WH6651> and doesn't <WH3045> know who shall gather. <WH622>
Now, <WH136> Lord, what do I wait <WH6960> for? <WH8431> My hope is in you.
Deliver <WH5337> me from all my transgressions. <WH6588> Don't <WH7760> make me the reproach <WH2781> of the foolish. <WH5036>
I was mute. <WH481> I didn't <WH6605> open my mouth, <WH6310> because you did it. <WH6213>
Remove <WH5493> your scourge <WH5061> away <WH5493> from me. <WH3615> I am overcome by the blow <WH8409> of your hand. <WH3027>

When you rebuke <WH8433> and correct <WH3256> man <WH376> for iniquity, <WH5771> You consume <WH4529> his wealth <WH2530> like a moth. <WH6211> Surely every man <WH120> is but a breath. <WH1892>" Selah. <WH5542>

"Hear <WH8085> my prayer, <WH8605> Yahweh, <WH3068> and give ear <WH238> to my cry. <WH7775> Don't <WH2790> be silent at my tears. <WH1832> For I am a stranger <WH1616> with you, <WH8453> a foreigner, as all my fathers were. <WH1>
Oh spare <WH8159> me, <WH1082> that I may recover strength, before I go away, <WH3212> and exist no more."
